risk: Incorrect discount application could lead to financial discrepancies.
severity_basis: This affects the core user journey and financial transactions.

test_cases.objective: Verify that a discount code can be entered during checkout.

risk: Potential confusion due to design placement changes.
severity_basis: Design changes can affect user experience but not core functionality.

test_cases.objective: Ensure the discount code entry is positioned correctly in the checkout flow.
test_cases.human_note: Check both cart page and checkout flow for placement.

risk: Ambiguity in discount value type could lead to incorrect discounts.
severity_basis: Incorrect discount calculations can affect financial transactions.

test_cases.objective: Validate that the discount engine correctly interprets the discount code.
test_cases.human_note: Test with both percentage and flat amount codes if applicable.

risk: Expired codes not returning clear messages could confuse users.
severity_basis: Affects user experience but not core functionality.

test_cases.objective: Ensure expired discount codes return a clear error message.

risk: Valid codes not applicable to items could lead to user frustration.
severity_basis: Affects user experience but not core functionality.

test_cases.objective: Verify that non-applicable valid codes return a user-facing message.

risk: Allowing multiple codes could lead to incorrect discount application.
severity_basis: This affects financial transactions and order processing.

test_cases.objective: Ensure only one discount code can be applied per order.

risk: Order total not updating in real time could mislead users.
severity_basis: Affects user experience but not core functionality.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the order total updates in real time when a discount code is applied.
test_cases.human_note: Check for performance issues during real-time updates.

risk: Discount code entry not working on mobile could limit accessibility.
severity_basis: Affects user experience on mobile devices.

test_cases.objective: Ensure the discount code entry field works on the mobile layout.
test_cases.human_note: Test on various mobile devices and screen sizes.
